description.value:
Specially crafted sling bag made from mixture of boiled and soft leather.

It contains multiple small compartments, each big enough to hold a single flask. Allows for easier and organized storage of potions, ingredients and other medical articles.

Special Rules

  • Counts as ‘worn’ when slung over your shoulder.

  • Can only hold drugs, potions, poultices, poisons, flasks, ingredients and bandages.

  • When worn, any item inside can be accessed with a @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.wmA76Q2zJJ9HrkvA#free-actions]{Free Action}.
